item.title: DL client
item.dc:creator: @whogoesthere whogoesthere
item.description:
@whogoesthere wrote:

[quote=“b00mz1029, post:1, topic:417895”]So I have a dl client but my friend just tried it and said the cmd thing came up but then dissapeared instantly I’m wondering if it’s cus of my ip? So this is my client folder, should I have my ip in the blank spot or something else?

public client() {
	alertHandler = new AlertHandler(this);
tabHPos = -1;
	fullscreenInterfaceID = -1;
	chatRights = new int[500];
	chatTypeView = 0;
	clanChatMode = 0;
	cButtonHPos = -1;
	cButtonHCPos = -1;
	cButtonCPos = 0;
	//server = "localhost";
	//server = "0.0.0.0";
	server = "blank";
	anIntArrayArray825 = new int[104][104];[/quote]try changing "localhost" and "0.0.0.0" to "127.0.0.1" see if that works

Read full topic

item.title: DL client

item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

So I have a dl client but my friend just tried it and said the cmd thing came up but then dissapeared instantly I’m wondering if it’s cus of my ip? So this is my client folder, should I have my ip in the blank spot or something else?

public client() {
	alertHandler = new AlertHandler(this);
tabHPos = -1;
	fullscreenInterfaceID = -1;
	chatRights = new int[500];
	chatTypeView = 0;
	clanChatMode = 0;
	cButtonHPos = -1;
	cButtonHCPos = -1;
	cButtonCPos = 0;
	//server = "localhost";
	//server = "0.0.0.0";
	server = "blank";
	anIntArrayArray825 = new int[104][104];
